name: Cistercian Abbeys
description:
Monasteries become self-sufficient, working their lands through Lay Brothers.
Villagers can drop off resources in Monasteries.
Prelates can be garrisoned in Monasteries to inspire all nearby Villagers, increasing their gather speed.

variations.descriptionCN:
修道院可以自给自足，通过俗人兄弟耕种他们的土地。
村民可以将资源存放在修道院。
高级教士可以驻扎在修道院中，鼓舞附近的所有村民，提升他们的采集速度。
